lead_paragraph: The payment by Royal Bank of Scotland fulfills a condition of a bailout that gave the British government priority for dividend payments.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; R.B.S. Pays Final Dividends to British Government
headline.main: R.B.S. Reimburses $1.7 Billion to British Government

snippet: The payment by Royal Bank of Scotland fulfills a condition of a bailout that gave the British government priority for dividend payments.
abstract: Royal Bank of Scotland announces it has made final payment of 1.19 billion pounds, around $1.7 billion, to British government in return for bailout package.
